General.Name: Hunan Nanling Industrial Explosive Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Explosive Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, production, sale, transportation, and blasting of civil blasting equipment and other equipment. The company's products include industrial cable explosives, including plastic nonel and detonating cords; industrial detonators comprising nonel and electronic detonators; and industrial explosives, such as permissible emulsion explosives for secondary coal mines, rock emulsion explosives, emulsion explosives permitted in class 3 coal mines, expanded ammonium nitrate explosives allowed in first-class coal mines, rock expanded ammonium nitrate explosives, and modified ammonium oil explosives. The company was formerly known as Hunan Nanling Industrial Explosive Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Explosive Co., Ltd. in May 2023. Explosive Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
